data.text:
Great stuff,,
Special thanks to April and Junaid.
Every thing is perfect 10/10 
but the coffee is extra expensive. (Its good though) 

The location is good, always around taxis and ride shares.
Rooms are beautiful,,
The view is great.
Room service is excellent 
It was very comfortable for business trip and i think it is great for tourism too
data.title: 10/10 great stuff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Basharn2024,

Thank you very much for choosing DAMAC Maison Aykon City for your stay and for taking time to write your positive feedback.
We appreciate your kind comments on the staff. We will personally pass on your praises to all the team.
We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our hotel, and once again, thank you for your positive comments and perfect score.
Sincerely and with 
Kind regards,
DAMAC Maison Aykon City Management
owner_response.author: Bipin Kesavankutty

data.text:
The most amazing stay and room service and cozy room and amazing view .
This place can’t be disappointed also very friendly and professional.
Thank you for the best hospitality .
The view it’s magical from them balcony also don’t be she to ask them for anything because sumittra and her team amazing
data.title: So happy for choosing this place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and experience with us.

We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We value every feedback that helps us to improve and serve our guests better. We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our hotel, and once again, thank you for your positive comments and perfect score.

Kind regards,
DAMAC Maison Aykon City Management
owner_response.author: Bipin Kesavankutty

data.text: The hotel rooms  are very clean as it’s a new hotel. The staff are super friendly and accommodating. They are very helpful and always trying to do the extra mile to accommodate our requests from the time we checked in to checked out. Special thanks to April and Fayez in Reception . 👏👏👏Keep up the amazing work you do for the guest and the hotel. Making us feel welcome in a new place. Also the rooms are kept clean and tidy by the great housekeeping team. Very sweet and thoughtful that they surprised us with roses on the bed on Valentine’s Day. Thank you Noman, Sagar and Adi Irfan from the housekeeping team👏👏 👏 I Excellent service at the restaurant too.  Ms Sakura always with a welcoming smile and great service from Hassan. Thank you ! I would surely come back and stay in this place and recommend Aykon Maison hotel to my friends.. 👍🏻 . Excellent service at the restaurant too.  Ms Sakura always with a welcoming smile and great service from Hassan. Thank you
data.title: Very accommodating and super friendly staff.

data.text: The hotel is great and the restaurant was great, the team were very friendly with big smile 😃 thank you for your hospitality and great service and late check out 🤣🤣🤣🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🤣🤣😃😃😃😃 hotel is near everything 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
data.title: Best stay with Aziz

data.text: Amazing location and hotel, staff super friendly and helpful especially mrs April who from the time I arrived she was super welcoming and friendly always making sure my needs were met. The rooms are super clean and with an amazing view over the city.
data.title: Great hotel and staff
